data.name: Monster Hunter Rise Extra Tracks
data.detailed_description:
Monster Hunter Rise Extra Tracks is an album made up of 8 additional tracks featured in the Version 3.0 update of Monster Hunter Rise, including the Valstrax battle themes and an additional ending song.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 153 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
